subject: Research Collaboration Opportunity with {organization}
body:
Dear {person_name},

I hope this email finds you well. I am writing to you in your capacity as {role} at {organization}.

We have been following the important research and academic work being conducted at {organization}, particularly in [specific area]. Our organization specializes in [Your Services/Products] and has been working with academic institutions to [Value Proposition].

We believe there may be opportunities for collaboration that could benefit both our organizations and contribute to the advancement of knowledge in [specific field]. We would be particularly interested in exploring:

- Potential research partnerships
- Knowledge exchange opportunities
- Joint initiatives that could benefit both our organizations

Would you be open to a discussion about potential areas of collaboration? We would be happy to provide more detailed information about our capabilities and discuss how we might work together.

Thank you for considering this opportunity. I look forward to your response.

Best regards,
[Your Name]
[Your Position]
[Your Company]
[Your Contact Information]
